item.description:
Climbing starts when we get there - those of you who want to get certified I have reserved spots for 4 people at 7pm (Confirmed with Lisa) Please call if you are going to be late.

NEW Rules for Rock Wall Climbing Events

1- First time climbers do not need to be certified. We want to give newcombers a no-pressure way of trying it out.

However, you must find a Certfied Belayer Buddy. Then you are required to buy them beer (or other form of liquid refreshment) and munchies cuz they didn't have any fun while they were watching your undercarriage go up the wall. The other option is to rent-a-belayer from Carabiners.

2 - Second Time Climbers - If You're combing back, You MUST get certified - it's not fair to those who will have to belay for you.

3 - I can't think of a 3rd one yet but I know there’s something I’m forgetting.

Belayer Certification training is $29 ... $21 with student, military or teachers ID
Tues BOGO (Buy One Get One Free) $19 adult ... $14 student
Rent-a-Belayer... $19 hr.

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Belayer Certification Training & Climbing
